snippet: Jordan Schermerhorn, the winner of the 2012 win-a-trip contest, discusses why Malawians have to overuse wood for fuel that they desperately need.
abstract: Jordan Schermerhorn, the winner of the 2012 win-a-trip contest, discusses why Malawians have to overuse wood for fuel that they desperately need.

headline.main: Too Much Wood, Too Little Power
